sentences.en: a photograph of Leon in profile.
a picture of the president in profile
a short profile of the actor
Commercialisation has given many sports a higher profile.
sentences.cn: 商业化已经让多项体育运动有了更高的公众关注度。
达尼的侧面轮廓很好看。

sentences.en: He sat in profile to me.
His handsome profile was turned away from us.
sentences.cn: 他英俊的侧影从我们眼前转开了。

sentences.en: In his first years as chairman he was instrumental in raising the company's wider profile.
sentences.cn: 他任董事长的最初几年为提升公司的知名度起到了积极的推动作用。

sentences.en: She has a beautiful [ fine ] profile .
sentences.cn: 她 侧面 看很美.

sentences.en: Somebody who is a foreign investor and more sensitive about the public profile will be more impacted by that pressure.
sentences.cn: 对公众形象较注意的外国投资者会更多地受到那种压力的影响。

sentences.en: The BBC are working on a profile of the British nuclear industry.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司正在报道英国核工业概况.

sentences.en: The consultant who suggested using spamming to raise the company's profile has been fired.
sentences.cn: 建议用群发邮件的方法来提升公司形象的那个顾问已经被解雇了。

sentences.en: The newspaper publishes a profile of a leading sportsman every week.
sentences.cn: 该报每周刊登一篇关于一名优秀运动员的简介.

sentences.en: The police deliberately kept a low profile in most places.
sentences.cn: 警方在大多数地方有意保持低调。

sentences.en: the sharp profile of the western foothills against the sky
sentences.cn: 西面山麓小丘在天空衬托下的清晰轮廓

sentences.en: This picture shows the girl in profile.
sentences.cn: 这张照片照的是女孩的侧面。

sentences.en: Tony has now been thrust into the limelight, with a high-profile job.
sentences.cn: 托尼现在一下子成了众人关注的中心，因为他有一份经常出镜、见报的工作。

sentences.en: We could see the profile of a distant hill if it is very clear.
sentences.cn: 如果天气晴朗,我们可看到远山的轮廓.

words.tran_cn: 侧面；轮廓；外形；[建][地质]剖面

phrases.tran_cn: 叶片轮廓；叶片剖面；叶型桨叶轮廓
公司简介；公司概况；企业介绍
沿深度掺杂分布图；深度剖面
鲜明的姿态；引人注目的高姿态；明确的立场
渐开线齿形；渐开线齿廓
保持低姿态；避免引人注目
土壤剖面；土层剖面；泥土成分；土剖面
温度曲线；温度剖面图；温度轮廓

trans.tran_cn: 侧面，半面，外形，轮廓，[航]翼型，人物简介
trans.tran_en: a side view of someone’s head

trans.tran_cn: 描…的轮廓，给…画侧面图，为（某人）写传略，[机]铣出…的轮廓
trans.tran_en: to write or give a short description of someone or something
